PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-00222014-01-28,  ,  ,  ,  ,  EC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Disposal at Sea Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the DISPOSAL AT SEA REGULATIONS in order to (1) increase predictability in permitting processes for disposal at sea; and (2) reduce the administrative burden imposed on applicants due to permitting processes without affecting current environmental protection measures.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0012 Publication Date: 2014-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
